bibl.title: Ethnic Continuity in the Jewish Diaspora in Antiquity.
bibl.note: Essay delivered at a conference in 1997 under the auspices of the Consultative Committee for the Bible and the Ancient Near East in the Royal Irish Academy. Considers in part. the case of Jews in the Egyptian chora during the Ptolemaic era.

bibl.title: Jews in the Hellenistic and Roman Cities

bibl.seg: BOHAK Gideon, Ethnic Continuity in the Jewish Diaspora in Antiquity.
J.R. BARTLETT (Ed.), Jews in the Hellenistic and Roman Cities (London - New York, 2002) pp. 175-192.

Essay delivered at a conference in 1997 under the auspices of the Consultative Committee for the Bible and the Ancient Near East in the Royal Irish Academy. Considers in part. the case of Jews in the Egyptian chora during the Ptolemaic era.
